game.name: Cats Spotter 猫咪观察员
game.shortDescription: "Cats Spotter"에 오신 것을 환영합니다! 이것은 즐거운 레저 게임으로, 당신의 임무는 다채롭고 화려한 냐옹 플래닛에서 모든 숨겨진 냐옹 별인을 찾는 것입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to "Cats Spotter"! This is a light-hearted and enjoyable casual game where your mission is to find all the hidden cats on a colorful and vibrant Meow Planet.

reviewHighlights.text: [u] Update Oct 23 2023 [/u] Updated Review after hints implemented and increased zoom. I still cannot recommend this game. I played a few more levels...
Can you spot all 600+ meowing cats on this huge map? It's not as easy as it sounds...believe me! Cats Spotter by Developer Catnip Studio When you find...
